author: CaptainFoxButt

text:
I disagree with this. Yes, there are many bad 3d games as well, but it's not the 3d that kills them, it's the decline of the gaming industry.

I'm aspiring to be an indie game developer, and my first game will be 3d. It will be top down perspective, the same as a 2d top down rpg. It will be a top down, action JRPG with a live action battle system augmented by special moves separated by time. It will play like a classic top down 2d action rpg, but will be 3d.

Would that be worth your time?

author: Sephiko

text:
One of the rare games where Mitsuda composed the soundtrack completely by himself. The part at 0:47 has a totally classic Mitsuda bass and riff. :P The calm part starting at 1:15 reminds me of Chrono Trigger too.
One of my most anticipated DS games.
